name: Tagup
description:
Tagup is an online platform that monitors diverse equipment around the
 world.Tagup 's mission is to predict equipment downtime and failures
 before they occur.

technologies.name: Node.js
technologies.description:
Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript run-time
 environment that executes JavaScript code outside of a
 browser.

technologies.name: MongoDB
technologies.description: MongoDB is a cross-platform document-oriented database program. Classified as a NoSQL database program

technologies.name: Vue
technologies.description:
The Progressive JavaScript Framework. Vue.js is Approachable,
 Versatile, Performant and has a low learning curve which makes it
 perfect for almost any project.

technologies.name: Vuepress
technologies.description:
Vuepress is a static site generator with focus towards
 documentations. Vuepress is Vue powered, simple and very performant
 which makes it perfect for documentations.

Challenge:
Tagup is an online platform that monitors diverse equipment around
 the world. Tagup's mission is to predict equipment downtime and
 failures before they occur.
Develop a fast & responsive Single Page App in Vue.js as well as support the development of the existing backend in Node.js
Time and budget were limited initially until the first MVP launch
The web application and the backend had to be well tested and stable
result: Within a few clicks, engineers can see live equipment data and predictions in a fast, responsive web application. The web application is now used by engineers & teams from various companies around the world.
results:
Within a few clicks, engineers can see live equipment data and
 predictions in a fast, responsive web application. The web
 application is now used by engineers & teams from various
 companies around the world.

The platform handles live data from sensors, user organizations,
 asset management & historical asset data.

Our collaboration with Tagup is almost at 1 year anniversary and
 ongoing
